pkgmetadata.longdescription: Causal Inference in Case-Control Studies // Estimation and inference methods for causal relative risk. Semiparametrically efficient estimation of the aggregated (log) odds ratio and a causal inference procedure for relative risk. For more details, see the paper by Jun and Lee (2020), "Causal Inference in Case- Control Studies," arXiv:2004.08318 [econ.EM].
